description:
I created this as a way to make ARAM style matches more fun. There isn't an easy way to pick random champions for a custom game at the moment so this allows for a group of friends to ask Alexa for a random champion that they can then play.

This skill is not sponsored or endorsed by Riot Games.
exampleInteractions: Alexa Ask champion picker for a random champion
imageAltText: Unofficial League of Legends Random Champ Picker icon
name: Unofficial League of Legends Random Champ Picker
shortDescription: Provides the requester with a random champion from a list of all champions currently in the game League of Legends
